Items Inventory - Wowee! Unlimited Space!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Items: Items Inventory - Wowee! Unlimited Space!
By John Hawley on Sunday, December 16, 2001 - 06:34 pm:

In a fit of curiousity, I started buying individual items to see how big our Inventory could get. I got up to thirty slots before I ran out of cash. At what looks to be 99 per item and at least 30 slots, looks like Tecmo listened when we said we needed more space.

By John Hawley on Sunday, December 16, 2001 - 07:10 pm:

Just checked. Yes, each slot can hold up to 99 of each item. Lots of space.
